text: “E inu amene mwakhulupirira! Musayandikire Swala uku muli oledzera, mpaka mudziwe chimene mukunena; ngakhalenso pamene muli ndi janaba (musapemphere kufikira mutasamba) kupatula amene ali pa ulendo (achite Tayammam). Ndipo ngati muli odwala, kapena muli pa ulendo, kapena m’modzi wanu wadza kuchokera kuchimbudzi, kapena mwakhudza akazi (m’njira ya ukwati) ndipo simunapeze madzi (osamba) chitani Tayammam ndi dothi labwino; lipakeni kunkhope kwanu ndi m’mikono mwanu. Ndithudi, Allah Ngofafaniza machimo, Ngokhululuka kwambiri
